name: Spring Forever
description:
Spring Forever is a challenging 2d retro platformer that evokes nostalgia through stunning pixel art and traditional game mechanics.

• Play across 6 beautiful handcrafted worlds.
• Simple and intuitive game mechanics.
• 16 outfits to choose for your character.
• Extremely cute and unique enemies.
• 48 Checkpoints to reach.
• Perfect for speed running.
• Cutscenes that reveals the story as you progress.
• Death counter.
• Eye candy pixel art graphics.
• Original feel good music and sound FX.
